violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) The water source and system shall be of sufficient capacity to meet the peak water demands of the FOOD ESTABLISHMENT. (Pf)
(B) Hot water generation and distribution systems shall be sufficient to meet the peak hot water demands throughout the FOOD ESTABLISHMENT. (Pf)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Provide sufficient supply if hot water such as a larger or additional hot water heater.

violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Constructed from materials that are not

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Outer openings of a FOOD ESTABLISHMENT shall be protected against the entry of insects and rodents. Unless otherwise allowed by law.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Not sealed to prevent pest entry
violationsByInspectionidList.subProblem: Screening that is sixteen mesh to the inch or greater

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT that is fixed because it is not EASILY MOVABLE shall be installed so that it is spaced to allow access for cleaning along the sides, behind, and above the EQUIPMENT or sealed as required,  COUNTER-MOUNTED EQUIPMENT that is not EASILY MOVABLE shall be installed to allow cleaning of the EQUIPMENT and areas underneath and around the EQUIPMENT .
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Seal to wall/equipment to facilitate cleaning.

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be maintained in good repair.
Cleaned EQUIPMENT and UTENSILS, laundered LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES shall be stored in an approved manner and location.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Exposed to dust, splash, or other contaminates
